      • impose

        public void impose(BaseImage image,
                   Color colorKey)
        Imposes an Image onto this Image, excluding all pixels that have the color colorKey. The Images have to be the same size.
        Parameters:
        image - - The Image that is imposed
        colorKey - - The color that is ignored

      • scale

                  int height,
                  int hint)
        Scales Image based on a new Width and Height.
        Parameters:
        width - - Width of the new Image.
        height - - Height of the new Image.
        hint - - Hint as to what type of scaling to use.

      • scale

        public void scale(double scale,
                  int hint)
        Scales Image based on the scale ratio.
        Parameters:
        scale - - Scale of the new Image.
        hint - - Hint as to what type of scaling to use.

      • scale

        public void scale(int width,
                  int height)
        Scales Image based on new width and height. Uses nearest neighbor scaling.
        Parameters:
        width - - Width of the new Image.
        height - - Height of the new Image.

      • scale

        public void scale(double scale)
        Scales Image based on scale ratio. Uses nearest neighbor scaling.
        Parameters:
        scale - - Scale of the new Image.

      • blur

        public void blur(int radius)
        Blurs an image based on a radius
        Parameters:
        radius - - Width of the square area used to blur.
